Upcoming Meetings in AI, Analytics, Big Data, Data Science, Deep Learning, Machine Learning: August and Beyond

Previous post
Next post

 
  http likes 110
Tags: AI, Analytics, Boston, Data Science, London, Meetings, New York City, San Francisco

Coming soon: KDD-2017 Halifax, JupyterCon NYC, Big Data Innovation Summit Boston, O'Reilly AI NYC, Strata NYC, Rework Deep Learning London, and many more.


By Gregory Piatetsky, KDnuggets.
Here are 100+ upcoming meetings and conferences, for August 2017 and beyond.

You can also find the latest list on KDnuggets Meetings page

Top keywords:
  • Analytics: 48
  • Data Science/Data Scientist: 20
  • AI/Artificial Intelligence: 12
  • Deep Learning: 11
  • Big Data: 10
  • Machine Learning: 8
  • KDD: 7
  • Data Mining: 6
  • Database: 4

Top countries:
  • USA: 61
  • UK: 13
  • Germany: 6
  • Canada: 5
  • Netherlands, India, France, Australia: 3
London again is the top city, beating San Francisco:
  • London: 12
  • San Francisco: 11
  • Boston: 8
  • New York: 7
  • Berlin: 4
  • Seattle, Chicago, Atlanta, Amsterdam: 3
Color code: Business-Oriented meetings in Blue, Research meetings (with calls for papers and program committee) in green


August 2017

  • Aug 4, Australia Sports Analytics Conference. Melbourne, Australia.
  • Aug 6-11, TDWI Anaheim Conference, the leading event for Analytics, Big Data and Data Science Training. Anaheim, CA, USA.
  • Aug 6-11, ICML 2017: 34th International Conference on Machine Learning. Sydney, Australia.
  • Aug 9, Data Science Popup. Dallas, TX, USA.
    Use code KDNUGGETS for 20% off.
  • Aug 10, ICML workshop on Automatic Machine Learning. Sydney, Australia.
  • Aug 13-17, KDD 2017, 23rd ACM SIGKDD Conference on Data Science. Halifax, NS, Canada.
  • Aug 14, KDD 2017 Workshop on Anomaly Detection in Finance. Halifax, NS, Canada.
  • Aug 19-25, The 15th Australasian Data Mining Conference (AusDM 2017). Melbourne, Australia.
  • Aug 21-23, 15th International Symposium on Spatial and Temporal Databases (SSTD 2017). Washington, DC, USA.
  • Aug 21-25, Deep Learning with Keras. Dresden, Germany.
  • Aug 22-25, JupyterCon, from Project Jupyter, the NumFOCUS Foundation, and O'Reilly Media. New York, NY, USA.
    Space is limited - register soon and save 20% extra w. code PCKDNG.
  • Aug 27 - Sep 2, Mathematical Modelling and Scientific Computing (MMSC 2017). Dobrich, Bulgaria.
  • Aug 28-31, DEXA 2017: 28th Int. Conf. on Database and Expert Systems Applications. Lyon, France.

  • Sep 6-7, Big Data & Analytics Innovation Summit. Shanghai, China.

    Use code KDNU17 for 25% off.

    Use code PCKDNG for 20% off. Early price ends Aug 4.

title: Upcoming Meetings in AI, Analytics, Big Data, Data Science, Deep Learning, Machine Learning: August and Beyond
content_html:
By Gregory Piatetsky, KDnuggets.
Here are 100+ upcoming meetings and conferences, for August 2017 and beyond.

You can also find the latest list on KDnuggets Meetings page

Top keywords:
  • Analytics: 48
  • Data Science/Data Scientist: 20
  • AI/Artificial Intelligence: 12
  • Deep Learning: 11
  • Big Data: 10
  • Machine Learning: 8
  • KDD: 7
  • Data Mining: 6
  • Database: 4

Top countries:
  • USA: 61
  • UK: 13
  • Germany: 6
  • Canada: 5
  • Netherlands, India, France, Australia: 3
London again is the top city, beating San Francisco:
  • London: 12
  • San Francisco: 11
  • Boston: 8
  • New York: 7
  • Berlin: 4
  • Seattle, Chicago, Atlanta, Amsterdam: 3
Color code: Business-Oriented meetings in Blue, Research meetings (with calls for papers and program committee) in green
